definition: location on wrist over the radial artery where pulse is taken in TCM
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: Objective:To explore relationship between the sphygmograms of the radial arteries and coronary heart disease(CHD).
sentences.chinese: 目的，为了探讨寸口脉脉象图和冠心病的关系。

sentences.english: The modern research find that the pulse at Cunkou is a multi-dimensional information convergence point.
sentences.chinese: 现代研究发现，寸口脉是一个多维信息的交汇点。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To observe the influence of seasonal changes on the pulsation of Renying pulse and Cunkou pulse.
sentences.chinese: 目的进行正常人人迎寸口脉动相关性的季节观察。

definition: location on wrist over the radial artery where pulse is taken in TCM
one of the channels of TCM
(TCM) the three truncal cavities (thoracic, abdominal and pelvic), known as the "triple heater" or "San Jiao"
the Divine Pivot or Spiritual Pivot, ancient Chinese medical text

acupuncture point (any point on any meridian)/category of 12 specific acupuncture points near the wrist or ankle, each lying on a different meridian (one of five categories collectively termed 五輸穴|五输穴)
(TCM) diagnosis based on the patient's pulse/to make such a diagnosis
